/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, add a sense of tranquility to the scene. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life that thrives in this peaceful setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered here and there, adding depth to the vast expanse. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the essence of the city in a single frame.
